description:
Build full Luiz Laffey Productions website based on this comprehensive spec:

**DESIGN SYSTEM:**
- Colors: Black (#0a0a0a), Gold (#d4a843), Cobalt Blue (#0047ab)
- Typography: Cormorant Garamond for headings, Outfit for body
- Animations: Fade-in effects, hover transitions

**NAVIGATION:**
Home | About | Services | Portfolio | Originals | Plans | Contact

**PAGES TO CREATE:**

1. **HOME (/)**: Hero with tagline, services preview (4 cards: Dubbing, Voice-Over, Translation, Subtitling), Originals teaser with both radio shows, testimonials section, contact CTA. Hero buttons: 'Explore Our Services' → /services, 'View Our Work' → /portfolio. NO standalone audio player on home.

2. **ABOUT (/about)**: Company story - Luiz Laffey Productions is a creative production company at the intersection of storytelling, sound, language, and culture. Founded by Luiz Laffey with 20+ years experience in voice acting, dubbing, radio broadcasting, music curation. Include mission pillars, philosophy section ('good production is invisible'), team info. NO phone number, NO location.

3. **SERVICES (/services)**: Overview of Voiceover (SAG-AFTRA standards), Dubbing (Luiz is Head of Languages at Angel Studios), Localization/Translation services. 'View Portfolio' buttons linking to /portfolio. 'Get a Quote' CTA.

4. **PORTFOLIO (/portfolio)**: Public showcase for professional work - Dubbing reels (before/after, multilingual), Voiceover demos (commercial, documentary, e-learning), Subtitling examples, Translation samples, Client work highlights.

5. **ORIGINALS (/originals)**: Radio programs hub. Show both programs with their official logos and descriptions. Cards for: Zero Point Zero (orange/cosmic aesthetic) and Luiz Laffey's Collection (gold/warm aesthetic). Both cards link to individual show pages. Add enhanced brightness/contrast filters to images.

6. **ORIGINALS - LUIZ LAFFEY'S COLLECTION (/originals/luiz-laffeys-collection)**: Show page with hero using neon card branding, full description ('More than a radio show — it's a musical journey. Disco, funk, soulful house, nu-disco with storytelling'), host profiles with enhanced photos:
   - Luiz Laffey (Host, Curator & Storyteller) - 40+ years DJ experience
   - Alexis Hart (Co-Host, Storyteller & Connector) - spontaneous, curious energy
   Free samples section (5 clips + 1 full episode), Member library preview (locked), Subscribe CTA.

7. **ORIGINALS - ZERO POINT ZERO (/originals/zero-point-zero)**: Show page with orange/cosmic aesthetic, 60-minute cosmic journey through electronic music since 1990s. Host profiles with enhanced photos:
   - Paulinho Ribeiro (Host & Creator) - career since 1987
   - Tony Caldeira (DJ & Producer) - fitness entrepreneur, radio enthusiast since 1990
   - Nilton Rabello (DJ & Vinyl Curator) - 1500+ vinyl records, lives in Philadelphia
   - Caio Eduardo (Technical Support)
   Free samples + member library.

8. **PLANS (/plans)**: Radio station licensing focus (B2B for broadcasters). Title: 'Universal Radio Subscription Offer' - 'Premium radio programming. Licensed. Ready to air.'
   Two tiers:
   - Standard ($9.99/month): Full access + generic promo materials
   - Annual Broadcaster ($99/year): Custom promotional materials for station
   Benefits: No production costs, consistent delivery, professional content, easy integration.
   CTA: 'Subscribe, download your first episode, and put it on air this week.'
   FAQ section for broadcaster concerns.

9. **CONTACT (/contact)**: Contact form (name, email, message - NO phone field), contact info showing ONLY email: contact@luizlaffeyproductions.com. NO phone, NO address, NO map, NO business hours.

10. **LOGIN (/login)**: Sign in/sign up tabs, social auth options, plan selection, benefits sidebar.

11. **DASHBOARD (/dashboard)**: Member area with program library, downloads, stats, promotions.

12. **AI VIDEO ADS (/services/ai-video-ads)**: Coming soon landing page. Positioning: production studio, NOT software. Hero: 'Cinematic advertising video production powered by AI' + subheadline about high-impact videos at accessible costs. Sections: The Problem (traditional video is expensive/slow), The Solution (AI as production engine with creative direction), Differentiators (5 bullet points), Visual Examples placeholder, Email signup for early access. Tone: confident, clear, professional - NO buzzwords or startup clichés.

**FEATURES:**
- Language selector (EN/PT/ES) with localStorage persistence in header
- Responsive mobile navigation
- Audio player components for samples
- Scroll to top on page navigation
- Footer on all pages with: company description (NO 'U.S.-based artistic'), contact email only, social links

**IMPORTANT:**
- Contact info: ONLY contact@luizlaffeyproductions.com everywhere
- NO phone numbers anywhere
- NO physical address/location
- Image filters: brightness(1.15), contrast(1.2), saturate(1.1) on show artwork and host photos

Add full i18n translation support with i18next library. Create translation files for English, Portuguese, and Spanish. Include translations for:
- Navigation menu items
- Home page hero and all sections
- Service cards and descriptions
- All button CTAs
- Footer content
- Plans page pricing and features
- Contact page labels

The language selector in the header should switch content instantly without page refresh. Store selected language in localStorage.

Complete overhaul of subscription system for radio programs:

1. REMOVE Login Button from Navigation
   - Remove the global "Login" button from the top navigation bar
   - Login should only appear contextually on Plans/Pricing page and radio program pages

2. REDESIGN Plans/Pricing Page (/plans)
   Title: "Broadcast Licenses for Professional Radio" (or similar B2B messaging)
   Remove consumer language like "deals" or "sales"
   
   Present THREE pricing tiers:
   
   A) Monthly Broadcast License - USD $29/month
      - Per program
      - Weekly broadcast-ready episodes
      - Download access during active month
      - Generic promotional materials
      - Cancel anytime
      - CTA: "Start Monthly License" → leads to Login
   
   B) Annual Broadcast License - USD $299/year
      - Per program  
      - Weekly episodes
      - Full year download access
      - Generic promotional materials
      - Priority support
      - CTA: "Start Annual License" → leads to Login
   
   C) Annual Dual-Program License - USD $418/year
      - ONLY appears if user has both programs
      - Both Zero Point Zero + Luiz Laffey's Collection
      - 30% preferential pricing vs two separate annuals
      - Framed as "Strategic Annual Partnership"
      - All benefits for both programs
      - CTA: "Activate Dual License" → leads to Login
      - Include badge: "30% Preferential Pricing" (NOT a sale/discount label)
   
   Add clear section:
   "What Your License Includes:"
   - Non-exclusive broadcast license
   - Valid during active subscription period
   - May broadcast on your station's frequencies and official digital streams
   - May NOT be resold, sublicensed, or redistributed
   - All IP remains with producer
   
   Remove old B2C language about individual listeners

3. BUILD Broadcasts Member Area (/broadcasts)
   This is the post-login destination for radio station subscribers
   
   Dashboard layout:
   - Header: "Your Licensed Programs"
   - Show cards for each program the user has licensed:
     * Program name
     * License type (Monthly/Annual)
     * Renewal date
     * Status (Active/Expired)
   
   For EACH licensed program card, show:
   - "Latest Episode" section with download button
   - "Episode Archive" expandable list (filterable by date)
   - "Promotional Assets" section:
     * Generic assets (available for all)
     * Customized station-branded assets (Annual subscribers only) - show "Premium" badge
   - Download buttons with file sizes
   
   Access Control:
   - Monthly subscribers see: weekly episodes, generic promos only
   - Annual subscribers see: weekly episodes, generic + customized promos
   - Customized assets hidden behind "Annual License Required" message for monthly subscribers
   
   Add section:
   "Manage Your Licenses"
   - Current subscription details
   - Renewal/upgrade options
   - Cancel subscription
   - License terms summary

4. ADD Contextual Login CTAs
   On Plans page: All CTAs lead to /login
   On radio program pages (/originals/zero-point-zero, /originals/luiz-laffeys-collection):
   - Add a "Get Broadcast License" CTA button in the member library preview section
   - This should lead to /login or /plans
   - Do NOT show login in global navigation anymore

5. UPDATE Login Page (/login)
   - Should have a radio programs context (not generic account)
   - Show message like: "Enter your credentials to access your licensed programs"
   - After login, redirect to /broadcasts
   - Remove any generic "member dashboard" copy
   - Focus: "Access your licensed radio programs"

6. PRICING STRUCTURE (implement as constants/logic):
   - Monthly: $29 per program
   - Annual: $299 per program
   - Dual Annual: $418 (when both programs selected) - show as "Strategic Annual Partnership"
   - Bundle discount: 30% off (598 → 418)
   - No bundles for monthly plans (always full price)

7. TONE & MESSAGING
   - Professional B2B language throughout
   - "Broadcast License" not "subscription"
   - "Professional radio broadcasters" audience
   - "Editorial licensing" concept
   - NO consumer marketing language
   - NO pressure tactics
   - Clear legal/licensing terms in plain English
